title: Chris Hughes 'joins Little Mix' as the Love Island star steps in for a poorly Jade Thirlwall
text:
He has been intricately documenting his time on tour with his girlfriend Jesy Nelson and her bandmates.

And Chris Hughes was delighted as he 'joined Little Mix' for a few hours, replacing a poorly Jade Thirlwall during a soundcheck at the SSE Arena in Belfast on Sunday afternoon, ahead of their performance later that evening.

The Love Island star took to Instagram to share a video of himself on stage with his girlfriend, Leigh-Anne Pinnock and Perrie Edwards as the ladies practiced their sensational vocals.

New member! Chris Hughes was delighted as he 'joined Little Mix' for a few hours at the SSE Arena in Belfast on Sunday afternoon, ahead of their performance later that evening

Chris captioned the video: 'Sound check ahead of tonight’s show. Stepping in for our Jade... onto the next #LM5.'

Wanting to push the point further, the reality star than shared a snap of himself and the three Little Mix singers standing atop a plank suspended in the air inside the arena, which he captioned: 'Dreams do come true.'

Taking to his Instagram stories while on stage, the joker shared a video of Little Mix's tour manager and a pal standing in the empty stadium while rehearsals continued, adding: 'Never felt so good being @jadethirlwall.'

Luckily for fans of the band, despite her illness, Jade managed to take to the stage for the scheduled gig, and delighted fans with her performance.

Stepping in: The Love Islander took to Instagram to share a clip of himself on stage, replacing a poorly Jade Thirlwall, as the rest of the band practiced their sensational vocals

Delighted: Wanting to push the point further, the reality star than shared a snap of himself and the three Little Mix singers standing atop a plank suspended in the air inside the arena

Standing in line: Chris appeared delighted at the opportunity to join Little Mix for a minute

Loving life: The ladies seemed equally pleased to have him as Jade's stand in

Joker: Taking to his Instagram stories while on stage, the joker shared a video of Little Mix's tour manager and a pal standing in the empty stadium while rehearsals continued

The funny soundcheck comes shortly after Chris told MailOnline how protective he is over his girlfriend, as he revealed he struggled to bite his tongue when she's cruelly trolled on social media.

The loved-up Love Island hunk also spoke about his long-term plans with Jesy Nelson, revealing he plans to be with her 'forever'.

Jesy recently detailed the horrific trolling she suffered after shooting to fame on the X Factor in a BBC Three documentary called Odd One Out, in which she also revealed she attempted to take her own life.

And when it comes to his girlfriend still getting rude comments towards, Chris admitted he 'struggles' with it and finds it difficult to turn a blind eye.

Happy days: The couple have been posing up a storm behind the scenes of the Little Mix tour

Protective: Their day together comes shortly after Chris told MailOnline how protective he is over his girlfriend

He explained: 'I struggle with it. Even with myself, when I initially came out of Love Island, I was kind of unaware of the whole social media thing so I used to snap back a lot and I used to fight back to everything. But I learnt that it isn’t the way forward.

'When it’s her, I get really protective and I struggle to bite my tongue. I have bitten back at a few people, when people say negative comments on my own stuff, I’ll say something back and block them.

'I like to have my say because I’m one of them people who fight for stuff.'

He continued: 'But I am very protective, because It’s not nice. Other people judge people who they don’t know, but I know who she is.

'Honestly you couldn’t meet anyone nicer, you’d walk away thinking “she’s the nicest girl I’ve ever met!” She’s got a heart of gold and she wouldn’t say boo to a goose.

'She’s got time for everyone and that’s the most frustrating thing. Stereotypically people would think she’s a different kind of girl but she’s such a nice person. My family just love her to bits.'
description: The Love Islander took to Instagram to share a video of himself on stage with the band at the SSE Arena in Belfast on Sunday afternoon, ahead of their performance later that evening
